name: Blue-Cloud Gateway Data Catalogue
description: Catalogue service built on open-source CKAN, integrated with D4Science Blue-Cloud services, supporting rich community-defined and extensible set of catalogue item typologies, and managing publications for Virtual Labs. Includes SDI for geospatial data, publishing, analytics, and storage frameworks.
owner_name: CNR-ISTI (Consiglio Nazionale delle Ricerche - Istituto di Scienza e Tecnologie dell'Informazione)
